diff_act: 2.flash a light on the control panel
3.produce a beep sound through the loudspeaker
4.inform the driver with indications of a busy line or network issues

regen.new_specification: The system shall provide a distinct audible and visual indication to the driver in case of network issues, different from the indication for a busy line.
The system shall provide a distinct audible and visual indication to the driver when a call connection fails due to network issues.
The system shall provide an audible and visual indication to the driver in case of network issues, distinguishing it from a busy line.

label: This shall also indicate if the called party was busy or if the network could not connect the call.
absence: specific indication of unsuccessful connect: busy or network error
